articles.title: Navy prepares for China conflict with newly announced strategy - Fox News
articles.description: The United States Navy released its "Navigation Plan for America’s Warfighting Navy" on Thursday, outlining how the U.S. will meet the growing threat of Chinese military aggression against Taiwan by 2027.
